description.value: Whenever an ally dies from Blood Loss or due to a failed Characteristic Test, the character has Intelligence Bonus Rounds where they can bring them back from the dead by spending a Fate Point and as a Full Action making a -30 Medicae Test. On success the ally is resuscitated, although not cured of any lost limbs or characteristic damage.

specialAbilities.name: Revive Dying
specialAbilities.description: Once per encounter, you may automatically stabilize a dying character within 2m as a Free Action.
